mapper.select: SELECT G.ART_ARTNUM AS ART_ARTNUM, G.ART_TITLE AS ART_TITLE, G.DELIVERY_PRICE AS DELIVERY_PRICE, G.ART_IMAGE AS ART_IMAGE, O.ART_PRICE AS ART_PRICE, O.ORDER_ID AS ORDER_ID, O.DELIVERY_METHOD AS DELIVERY_METHOD, O.RECEIVER_NAME AS RECEIVER_NAME, O.DELIVERY_ADDRESS AS DELIVERY_ADDRESS, O.DELIVERY_MESSAGE AS DELIVERY_MESSAGE, O.CARD_COM_NAME AS CARD_COM_NAME, O.CARD_PAY_MONTH AS CARD_PAY_MONTH, O.DELIVERY_STATE AS DELIVERY_STATE, M.GALLERY_ID AS GALLERY_ID, M.GALLERY_NAME AS GALLERY_NAME, M.GALLERY_NICKNAME AS GALLERY_NICKNAME, M.GALLERY_EMAIL AS GALLERY_EMAIL FROM GALLERY_SHOP O INNER JOIN GALLERY_ADMIN G ON O.ART_ARTNUM = G.ART_ARTNUM INNER JOIN GALLERY_MEMBER M ON O.GALLERY_ID = M.GALLERY_ID WHERE O.ORDER_ID = #{orderId}
